title: The Brides of Dalton Series: Mail Order Bride Historical Western Box Set
description: Join the adventures of 5 handsome cowboys and watch their hearts soften as they fall in love with their unlikely brides.  Each story is filled with heartache, passion, humor, love and romance; and will leave you wanting more.   If you love western romance with a happily ever after you HAVE to read all 5 books.  The Brides of Dalton Box Set includes:  1. Louisa: Mail Order Mother for Christmas 2. Catherine: Unexpected Indian Mail Order Bride 3. Loretta: The Desperate Bride 4. Genevieve: Mail Order Bride's Secret Baby 5. Sally: Stowaway Mail Order Bride
author: Bethany Rose
